title: Purfect For Your Fur Baby

posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!

Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Four Lakes is the premier luxury apartment community in the beautiful Lakeland Hills, just a stone's throw away from Lake Tapps.

Convenient to Highway 167 and prime shopping locations, Four Lakes features spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom units, some with attached garages, some with views of Mt. Rainier, and all with microwaves, full sized washers and dryers, and extra storage.
